name: SimpleRegistry
tag_list: cash-registry, wedding-registry, registry, baby-registry, honeymoon-registry, life-event-registry, fundraising-registry, registry-scanner, mobile-scanner
overview:
SimpleRegistry enables you to buy what you want, when you want. It is the worldâ€™s most flexible registry system.

SimpleRegistry is a one-stop registry service that enables engaged couples, future parents, and any group or individual fundraiser to add activities, experiences, and items from any retailer in the world to one easy-to-manage registry page. All gifts are stored and redeemed directly as cash, allowing the member flexibility unparalleled in the registry marketplace.

  • Register Anything, Anywhere. The powerful SimpleAdder bookmark tool makes it easy to add items from any website with just one click, but members are not limited to registering tangible items. Anything they can think of, and assign a cost to, can be added to their registry.

  • Mobile access. The SimpleRegistry mobile app allows members the ability to visit a store anywhere in the world, quickly scan a barcode or snap a photo with their deviceâ€™s camera, and add the item to their registry.

  • Split expensive gifts into manageable pieces to easily allow group gifting.

  • Custom web addresses for all member registry pages, so it’s easy to send family and friends to one personalized place.

  • Skip all the hassles of out-of-stock items, having to return wrong sizes or colors, or those (inevitably) missing gift receipts by receiving cash for all items.

funding_rounds.source_description: SimpleRegistry Gets Gift Of Seed Funding From CincyTech

external_links.title: SimpleRegistry: an easy-to-use online cash registry for parents who don't need more baby crap
